charges.charge_description: 18:2312.F TRANSPORT ETC. STOLEN VEHICLES, AIRCRAFT, IN VIOL. of 18:371 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 2/28/95: REVOKING SUPERVISED RELEASE rendered on 4/19/93 from the District of South Carolina and on 9/24/93 from the S/D of Alabama, be amended and modified as follows: The defendant shall reside in a Community Corrections Center for at least 120 DAYS, or until discharged. 8/31/95: ORD REVOKING PROBATION CUSBP FOR A TERM OF 6 MOS., BEGINNING 7/18/95, AND TO BE RELEASED ON 1/18/96, WITH SPEC COND. DEFT SHALL RESIDE AT THE DISMISS HOUSE, NO CONTACT WITH DEBBIE HOWARD AND RESTITUION IN THE AMT OF $5,516.00. THIS CASE SHALL RUN CONC WITH CASE NO 1:94-CR-435-FMH. 8/31/95: REVISED ORDER REVOKING SUPV'D REL JUDGMENT AND COMMITMENT. THE DEFT IS CUSBP FOR A TERM OF: 6 MOS. The deft shall reside at the Dismiss House; Restitution $5,516.00. Drug and domestic violence screening. The deft shall be employed full-time. (1)
